item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! I’m Thang Pham, aka aome. I’m an incoming fourth-year Computer Science student at University of Waterloo. I enjoy building things and tinkering with cool tech. Currently, I’m interested in developing software for robotics and automation systems. During my free time, I enjoy listening to music while reading news, articles, and discussions from different websites. Beside that, I often mess around with tools/apps, customize them, and build some for my uses.
